properties.name: range
properties.description: Form element for selecting numbers within a given range.
properties.parameters: [["Min","Value","Mandatory!","Minimum selectable value."],["Max","Value","Mandatory!","Maximum selectable value."],["Step","Value","1","Determines the scale of the increments between minimum und maximum selectable value."]]
properties.storage:
Numbers are stored with '.' as decimal, if required.

E.g.: "42.42"
